description: At G3, we want to make a difference in our customers' lives by providing them with an incredible opportunity to transition to solar energy. Our goal is to help people keep their hard-earned money in their pockets while eliminating their electricity bills. As a Solar Sales Consultant in Wichita, you'll be part of a dynamic team that works with homeowners to introduce them to the advantages of solar energy. You'll have a flexible schedule and the potential to earn a great income, as well as the satisfaction of knowing you're helping people in the local community. We believe in providing our employees with the best training and support to reach their full potential, as well as creating a supportive environment where everyone can thrive. So, if you're passionate about making a difference, motivated to make good money, and not afraid to knock on doors, don't hesitate to apply! We are confident that you'll be able to meet your goals and find success here at G3.
